alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary; Morris; Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 3:33AM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 010, 020, 021, 022, 023, AND 034... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. a Fire Weather Watch has also been issued. This Fire Weather Watch is in effect from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 008, 009, 010, 020, 021, 022, 023, and 034. * WIND...South to southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 25 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity in the 20 to 25 percent range. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
